segments.text: I see the girl standing there, waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just holding out her hand like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this is for her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is clearly about to tip, but she doesn’t seem concerned at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s just focused on getting that cookie, nothing else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is spreading, and she’s standing right next to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip and fall because of the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so chaotic, but she’s just standing there calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined she looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be disappointed if her brother falls before she gets her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
